meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of medicine dealing with children and their diseases.
meanings.sent1: The paediatric ward at the hospital is brightly colored to make children feel more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The paediatrician carefully examined the young patient to diagnose the illness.
meanings.sent3: The clown in the paediatric unit made the children laugh while they waited for their check-ups.
meanings.sent4: Her paediatric approach to teaching involves using games and interactive activities.
meanings.sent5: The paediatric nurse's gentle demeanor helped calm the scared child before the procedure.

meanings.definition: A doctor who specializes in the care of children.
meanings.sent1: The paediatric is known for his friendly nature and ability to connect with young patients.
meanings.sent2: We took our son to the paediatric for his regular check-up.
meanings.sent3: The paediatric always keeps a stash of stickers to reward brave kids after appointments.
meanings.sent4: As a paediatric, she believes in treating not just the illness but the whole child.
meanings.sent5: The paediatric's waiting room is filled with toys to entertain waiting children.
